Uses of Interface
xxl.core.math.functions.RealFunction

  • Packages that use RealFunction 
    Package Description
    xxl.core.math
    The package xxl.core.math provides classes that issue mathematical topics.
    xxl.core.math.functions
    The package xxl.core.math.functions contains necessary classes and interfaces to work with real-valued functions.
    xxl.core.math.numerics.integration
    This package provides two techniques for the numerical integration of a real-valued function that is defined over an interval [a,b].
    xxl.core.math.numerics.splines
    The package xxl.core.math.numerics.splines computes a cubic Bezier-Spline interpolation with one of the two common boundary conditions for a one-dimensional real-valued function by determining the necessary parameters.
    xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric
    The package xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric provides several methods based on nonparametric statistics.
    xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.aggregates
    The package xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.aggregates provides several aggregate functions for nonparametric estimators.
    xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.kernels
    The package xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.kernels provides concrete kernels and abstract modellings.
    xxl.core.util.random
    The package provides interfaces to wrap different kinds of PRNGs (pseudo random number generator) for using them within XXL

    • Uses of RealFunction in xxl.core.math

      Methods in xxl.core.math with parameters of type RealFunction 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static double[] Maths.errorEstimation(double[] grid, RealFunction orig, RealFunction est)
      Compares two real functions f and g on a grid and computes the local errors.
      static double[] Maths.errorEstimation(double a, double b, int n, RealFunction orig, RealFunction est)
      Compares two real functions f and g on a grid and computes the local errors.
      static double[] Statistics.evalRealFunction(double[] grid, RealFunction f)
      Evaluates a real-valued function on a given grid of double values.
      static double[] Statistics.evalRealFunction(double a, double b, int n, RealFunction f)
      Evaluates a real-valued function on equally spaced, real-valued data points.
      static double Maths.qNewton(double start, double epsilon, RealFunction f)
      Returns a root computed with the modified Newton method (a special root-finding technique ) using a given starting value and a given error bound.
      static double[] Maths.rootFinding(double a, double b, double h, RealFunction f)
      Returns all roots of a given (continuous) real-valued function as double[] using a combination of the modified Newton method and a Bisection method.

    • Uses of RealFunction in xxl.core.math.functions

      Classes in xxl.core.math.functions that implement RealFunction 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractRealFunctionFunction
      This class provides a skeletal implementation for classes extending Function and also implementing RealFunction.
      static class  AdaptiveWeightFunctions.ArithmeticWeights
      This class provides an arithmetic weighting, i.e., equal weights in every step.
      static class  AdaptiveWeightFunctions.GeometricWeights
      This class provides a geometric weighting, i.e., in each step the same weight alpha respectively (1-alpha) is assigned.
      static class  AdaptiveWeightFunctions.LogarithmicWeights
      This class provides a logarithm weighting.
      static class  AdaptiveWeightFunctions.ProgressiveDegressiveWeights
      This class provides a progressive respectively degressive weighting with a parameter alpha.
      class  FunctionRealFunction
      This class provides a wrapper for objects of type Function working with numerical data for using them as a real-valued function.
      class  LinearCombination
      This class provides a linear combination of two given RealFunctions as a RealFunction.
      Fields in xxl.core.math.functions declared as RealFunction 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      RealFunction LinearCombination.f1
      first RealFunction
      RealFunction LinearCombination.f2
      second RealFunction
      static RealFunction RealFunctions.Identity
      Returns the identity function defined by f:R → R respectively, f:double → double.
      protected RealFunction RealFunctionFunction.realFunction
      real-valued function to wrap
      protected RealFunction RealFunctionArea.realFunction
      real-valued function to integrate
      protected RealFunction AdaptiveAggregationFunction.weights
      RealFunction that consumes the current step and returns the corresponding weight
      Methods in xxl.core.math.functions that return RealFunction 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RealFunction Differentiable.derivative()
      Returns the first derivative of the implementing class as a real-valued function.
      static RealFunction RealFunctions.distCont01()
      Returns a RealFunction modeling the distribution function G(x) = x^2 * I(x)[0,1].
      static RealFunction RealFunctions.invDistCont01()
      * Returns a function g(x) that represents the inverse of the CP01 distribution with G^{-1}(y) = \sqrt(y) * I(y)[0,1].
      static RealFunction RealFunctions.invDistCont02()
      Returns a function g(x) that represents the inverse of the CP02 distribution.
      static RealFunction RealFunctions.pdfCont01()
      * Returns a function g(x) that is required for generating samples of a random variable with the CP01 pdf.
      static RealFunction RealFunctions.pdfCont02()
      Returns a function g(x) that is required for generating samples of a random variable with the CP02 pdf.
      static RealFunction RealFunctions.pdfCP00()
      Returns a RealFunction providing f(x) = x^4 + I[0.3,1](x).
      static RealFunction RealFunctions.pdfCP01()
      Returns a pdf f:R → R defined by
      f(x) = f1(x) * ( 0 <= x <= 1/3) + f2(x) * ( 1/3 < x <= 1)
      with
      f1(x) = 1 + 27x^2 - 54x^3
      and
      f2(x) = (169/8) - 135x + (2619 x^2)/8 - (693x^3)/2 + 135x^4
      .
      static RealFunction RealFunctions.pdfCP02()
      Returns a pdf f:R → R defined by
      f(x) = f1(x) * ( 0 <= x <= 0.3) + f2(x) * ( 0.3 < x < 0.6 + f3(x) * ( 0.6 <= x <= 1))
      with
      Thereby, f1, f2, f3 are local polynomials of degree 3 such that the overall function constitutes a pdf and contains two jumps.
      RealFunction Integrable.primitive()
      Returns the primitive of the implementing class as a real-valued function.

      LinearCombination(RealFunction f1, double w1, RealFunction f2, double w2)
      This class performs a linear combination of the given real-valued functions with two given scalars.

      Constructs a new Object of this type.

    • Uses of RealFunction in xxl.core.math.numerics.splines

      Classes in xxl.core.math.numerics.splines that implement RealFunction 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CubicBezierSpline
      This class implements a cubic Bezier-Spline interpolation with one of the two common boundary conditions for a one-dimensional real-valued function by determining the necessary parameters.
      class  RB1CubicBezierSpline
      This class implements a cubic Bezier-Spline with the first boundary condition.
      class  RB2CubicBezierSpline
      This class implements a cubic Bezier-Spline with the second boundary condition.

    • Uses of RealFunction in xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric

      Classes in xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric that implement RealFunction 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  EmpiricalCDF
      This class realizes a real-valued function providing an empirical cdf (cumulative distribution function) based on a simple random sample (iid) for data given by objects of type Number.

    • Uses of RealFunction in xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.kernels

      Classes in xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.kernels that implement RealFunction 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractKernelCDF
      One main problem of nonparametric statistics is the estimation of the probability density function (pdf) of a random variable.
      class  AbstractKernelDensityEstimator
      One main problem of nonparametric statistics is the estimation of the probability density function (pdf) of a random variable.
      class  BiweightKernel
      This class models the Biweight kernel function.
      class  CosineArchKernel
      This class models the CosineArch kernel function.
      class  DifferenceKernelEstimator
      This class provides a difference kernel estimator (dke).
      class  EpanechnikowKernel
      This class models the Epanechnikow kernel function.
      class  GaussianKernel
      This class models the Gaussian kernel function.
      class  HybridKernelCDF
      This class provides an implementation of a kernel based estimator for a cumulative distribution function (cdf).
      class  HybridKernelDensityEstimator
      This class provides an implementation of a kernel based density estimator based upon a simple random sample for data given by objects of type Number.
      class  KernelFunction
      This class provides the usage of kernel functions for statistical purposes.
      class  NativeKernelCDF
      This class implements an abstract preimplementation of a kernel based cdf estimator AbstractKernelCDF that doesn't use an explicit technique for avoiding boundary effects.
      class  NativeKernelDensityEstimator
      This class implements an abstract preimplementation of a kernel based pdf estimator AbstractKernelDensityEstimator that doesn't use an explicit technique for avoiding boundary effects.
      class  ReflectionKernelCDF
      This class implements an abstract preimplementation of a kernel based cdf estimator AbstractKernelCDF that uses reflection for avoiding boundary effects.
      class  ReflectionKernelDensityEstimator
      This class implements an abstract preimplementation of a kernel based pdf estimator AbstractKernelDensityEstimator that uses reflection for avoiding boundary effects.
      class  TransformedKernelFunction
      This class provides a transformation of a one-dimensional kernel function with restricted support to [-1,1] like the epanechnikow kernel function or the biweight kernel function to an interval given by [l,l+c].
      class  TriweightKernel
      This class models the Triweight kernel function.
      class  UniformKernel
      This class models the Uniform kernel function.
      Methods in xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.kernels that return RealFunction

      RealFunction TriweightKernel.derivative()
      Returns the first derivative of the Triweight kernel function as real-valued function.

      Returns the first derivative of the transformed kernel function if and only if the used kernel function for transformation itself implements the interface Differentiable.

      Returns the first derivative of the Gaussian kernel function as real-valued function.

      Returns the derivatives of the dke as {RealFunction.

      RealFunction UniformKernel.primitive()
      Returns the primitive of the Uniform kernel function as real-valued function.
      RealFunction TriweightKernel.primitive()
      Returns the primitive of the Triweight kernel function as real-valued function.
      RealFunction TransformedKernelFunction.primitive()
      Returns the primitive of the transformed kernel function if and only if the used kernel function for transformation itself implements the interface Integrable.

      Returns the primitive of the Epanechnikow kernel function as real-valued function.
      RealFunction CosineArchKernel.primitive()
      Returns the primitive of the CosineArch kernel function as real-valued function
